page.title: 12Local Industry
page.content: W.D.& H.O. Wills was built in 1953 and is situated on Alexandra Parade in the Dennistoun area of Glasgow.It has a workforce of 1,200 which used to be 3,000.The decrease in labour is due to newly developed machines producing 10,000 cigars per minute. Products of this factory are cigars and tobacco.It no longer produces cigarettes, and there are no cigarette manufactures in Scotland.Methods of distibution are by road and rail.This factory produces 3,500,000 cigars in one week and in 1984 the factory broke its own annual production record by producing a staggering 231,000,000 cigars.
